boardgame.name: Jenseits von Theben
boardgame.description: This entry is for the original Jenseits von Theben; for the new printing by Queen, go to Thebes._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Jenseits von Theben is a game of competitive archeology. Players are archaeologists who must travel around Europe to acquire knowledge about five ancient civilizations -- the Greeks, the Cretans, the Egyptians, the Palestinians, and the Macedonians -- and then must use this knowledge to excavate historical sites in the areas of these civilizations. Periodically, there are expositions at major European cities, and the archaeologist who shows up on time with the best collection of artifacts (plus a minor die roll) wins the purse. The archaeologist who learns the most about the civilizations, claims the greatest-valued artifacts, and presents the biggest collection to the European exhibitions will win out over his or her colleagues._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The key element to the game is that it is played out over a period of two (or three) years, and each action a player performs takes a certain amount of time -- traveling is a week between cities, gathering knowledge takes time for the level of the knowledge, and actually digging at a cultural site takes time to yield a certain number of artifact cards. The game uses a novel mechanic to keep track of this -- there is a track of 52 spaces around the outside of the board, and each time a player moves and takes an action, he or she moves their player token forward in time. Players take turns based on being the one who is furthest back in _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;time_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. So, a player can go to an excavation site and spend 10 weeks digging for artifacts, but that will also mean that the other players will likely be taking several actions in the interim while that player waits for the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;time_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; to catch up._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In addition, the artifact cards in each civilization are a hidden number. The deck for each civilization contains twelve treasures of varying point values and two knowledge cards, with another sixteen cards of dirt. At the beginning of the game, seven cards are removed from each deck without the players seeing them. Through the course of the game, when a player excavates at a site, he or she keeps the artifacts that are revealed from a site, but the dirt is shuffled back into the remaining cards. Both the imperfect information element as well as the recycled dirt make for a random chance element that is overcome somewhat by digging at a site where a player has much knowledge -- more knowledge means that more cards will be revealed in a shorter period of time, and a greater chance of revealing treasures that may yet remain after another player has already recovered some treasures from that site._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The original run of Jenseits von Theben was hand-produced by Prinz Spiele in a first edition of 100, and a second edition of 300._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Re-implemented by:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Thebes_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2006 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee
2007 International Gamers Awards - General Strategy; Multi-player Nominee

New 2005 edition. The box was slightly squashed in its trip across the Atlantic. Otherwise, the game is new and unopened.

Unplayed copy of the 2nd edition, ordered directly from Peter Prinz himself. This copy is undamaged and appears to be complete. (All the decks are present, but I haven_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t removed the packaging and counted every card.) English rules are included.
Played a couple of times, but everything is still in excellent condition.
2nd Edition

Second Edition. New and in perfect condition. Payment in Germany: bank transfer Payment outside of Germany: paypal or cash in Euros Shipping costs: In Germany: 7 Euros (including insurance) In the European Union: 9,5 Euros (without insurance) or 18€ (including insurance) USA and Canada: 13,5 Euros (without insurance) or 33€ (including insurance)
Second edition, never played. Comes with English rules.
Game in excellent condition - played once. Buyer to pay actual shipping costs. Check, money order and non-credit card Paypal accepted. Will ship worldwide.

This is the second, improved limited edition. Box and components are like new, with one modification. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve pasted the original designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s digging schedule to the reverse of the schedules included in the second edition. I recommend you use the designer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s schedule for a better, tighter game.
Second print run Prince Spiele. Played 5 times or so and in perfect shape!

Complete, played a couple times. The box shows some minor scuffing from use, but there is no creasing or tearing. Likewise, the map shows some minor edge wear, but is in generally excellent condition. Cards are in excellent condition and show few signs of use. Rest of components are like-new. Shipping for priority mail in the US. Please write for shipping elsewhere; shipping weight 2lb.
only played a few times. great condition. 2nd edition, limited printing. RARE.

This is the 2nd print edition, played only two times. The game is in excellent condition however the box was received directly from the publisher a little beat up and I can provide pictures if you like. All in all this is a great little game that I don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t really want to part with, however I need to thin down my collection a bit.

2nd edition of the game. Played only twice, everything is in excellent condition ! I prefer payment with Paypal at no extra fees but will accept other methods. Shipping is 5.00$ for Canada and 8.00$ for the USA. Contact me for internationnal rates.
gently used (played 3x) complete and in great shape. 2nd Edition Prinz Spiele Edition. English rules. Buyer pays shipping from NY 11783. PayPal only

Second edition. Game is in used condition. Box has a split and shows wear. Components are more than complete (there are some extra cards). Game got a lot of play so it is in very playable condition but is not a show piece. Cards show a little wear and board has some indentations. Chart covers were never used and are still uncut. Shipping will be actual postage cost.

2nd edition of Prinz Spiele version. Lightly played and in excellent condition. Multiple copies of English instructions provided. Four laminated player aids provided as well. $8.95 shipping to continental U.S. (cheaper if you are close to the 94024 zip code). Cost will be higher for AK and HI. I will ship the game via USPS Priority mail the next business day after I receive payment.

This is the limited 2nd edition. Game is in excellent condition. All the components are present and correct.
Weight inc packing 685g UK First class £3.51 Surface Worldwide £5.10 Europe Airmail £5.61 USA Airmail £9.07
Shipping costs shown are for an individual game. I will combine shipping as best I can. Large packages (5kg, say 6 games) are very cost-effective to ship internationally via DHL. Ask if you want a detailed price.
First edition, hand made by the author. Never played, unpunched.

2nd Edition. Complete _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Excellent clean condition with English and German rulebook. Unused label sheets. Box is undamaged with only very slight bending underneath (as the material used is fairly thin). Two of the city cards have a slight marking down the front and rear sides but there are two extra city cards included (89 cards instead of 87). The extra cards appear to be specialised knowledges (I _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; II value) from one of the dig areas (see photos). Reasonable offers will be considered. I can combine multiple purchases to reduce shipping costs. Shipping Costs: UK £4, Europe £7, USA/CAN £15

Played once. This hand-made limited 1st ed. was produced with a very flimsy box, so there is inevitably some bowing and minor marking on this - but no splits or tears. The rest of the components are in excellent condition.
Bought at Essen in 2005. Played once. Box solid, but with a minor bash on corner. Components all present and in good excellent condition.
RESERVED FOR BENJAMING MILLER AT $8.00 This is the original Prinz version. Everything is complete and in excellent condition.

Jenseits von Theben (2005) by Prinz Box: Box is extremely lightweight yet in near mint condition! Box top is also autographed by the designer. The photo in this listing (and in the top row, right-hand column of the game photo gallery) is a picture of this exact game. Components: Complete and in like new condition! Pieces have been sorted and stored in plastic bags for convenience and protection - you will be very pleased with how the game has been packaged. SHIPPING: U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 2 lbs. from zip code 85208. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me before buying for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings.

Jenseits von Theben (2005) by Prinz Box: Box is extremely lightweight yet in near mint condition! This cover is just like the photo but WITHOUT the autograph. Pieces have been sorted and stored in plastic bags for convenience and protection - you will be very pleased with how the game has been packaged. SHIPPING: U.S. shipping will be via USPS Priority Shipping and based on a weight of 2 lbs. from zip code 85208. International buyers are very welcome, but please contact me before buying for a shipping price quote to avoid any surprises or misunderstandings.

This the the 2nd Printing, bought at Essen in 2005. The box has some shelf wear, the contents are in good shape. I charge a flat $10 for shipping, with combined rates are available. Please message me with any questions. Thank you for looking!
*Reserved* This is the 2nd edition. The game did not come shrinkwrapped, but the components have never been out of the box. Comes from a smoke-free home.
